attributes.title: Million Dollars, But...
attributes.caption: What would you do for a million dollars? Gavin, Burnie, and Barbara would do anything to get rich. Seriously. Anything.
attributes.description: What would you do for a million dollars? Gavin, Burnie, and Barbara would do anything to get rich. Seriously. Anything.

attributes.title: Glowing Dicks & Pretty Chicks
attributes.caption: Episode 2
attributes.description: This week, Gus joins Gav and Burnie to discuss memory loss, sexy puke, and glowing dicks. Would you take the million dollars?

attributes.title: Money Mouth & Delayed Climax
attributes.caption: Episode 3
attributes.description: This week Kerry joins Burnie and Gavin. They discuss delayed climaxes, licking money, and a world full of talking objects.

attributes.title: Birthday Sex & Negativity Light
attributes.caption: Join Barbara, Gavin, and Burnie as they eat all the birthday cake and travel through time to witness their conception.
attributes.description: Join Barbara, Gavin, and Burnie as they eat all the birthday cake and travel through time to witness their conception.

attributes.title: Magic Dogs & Muscle Men
attributes.caption: This week, Colton Dunn joins Chris and Burnie to discuss what he would do for $1 million. Not even magic dogs and vomiting spaghetti will get between them and their money.
attributes.description: This week, Colton Dunn joins Chris and Burnie to discuss what he would do for $1 million. Not even magic dogs and vomiting spaghetti will get between them and their money.Featuring:Burnie Burns Chris DemaraisColton DunnDavid Schachterle as Burnie's BodybuilderDevon Robinson as Colton's BodybuilderRaquel Whitney as Colton's Mother

attributes.title: Baby Burnie & Hitler Honeymoon
attributes.caption: This week Chris and Aaron from Social Disorder join Burnie. They meet Baby Burnie, go on a series of bad dates with Hitler, and enjoy delicious sponge.
attributes.description: This week Chris and Aaron from Social Disorder join Burnie. They meet Baby Burnie, go on a series of bad dates with Hitler, and enjoy delicious sponge.

attributes.title: Sudden Nudity & Permanent Parachutes
attributes.caption: This week Gavin and the Free Play crew decide if they’ll take a million dollars for disappearing clothes or always wearing a parachute.
